nodes.name: batchDeposit

devdoc.details: The batch size has an upper bound due to the block gas limit. Each atomic          deposit costs ~62,000 gas. The current block gas-limit is ~12,400,000 gas.  /// Author:  Staked Securely, Inc. (https://staked.us/)

params.deposit_data_roots: - An array of the SHA-256 hash of the SSZ-encoded DepositData object.
params.pubkeys: - An array of BLS12-381 public keys.
params.withdrawal_credentials: - An array of public keys for withdrawals.

batchDeposit(bytes[],bytes[],bytes[],byt.notice: Submit index-matching arrays that form Phase 0 DepositData objects.         Will create a deposit transaction per index of the arrays submitted.

getFees(uint256).notice: returns the amount of fees necessary for staking

userdoc.notice: Batch ETH2 deposits, uses the official Deposit contract from the ETH          Foundation for each atomic deposit. This contract acts as a for loop.          Each deposit size will be an optimal 32 ETH.
